11.title: Teenager

choices: Jack says yes-they can do it.
111.content:
Matt got home from school and threw his backpack down on the floor. He stopped by the kitchen to grab his usual after-school snack: some crackers and a glass of milk. Matt got his food and headed upstairs to do his homework and watch some TV before supper. That had been his routine for the past decade and a half, and it wasn't about to change anytime soon.

Supper was, as usual, nothing much. A chicken breast, some vegetables...Matt sighed. He had eaten the same stuff, day in and day out, for 15 years now. And he was tired of it. Bland, boring, "good for you" food wasn't what he wanted. But, unfortunately, that was really his only option. He didn't have the money to go buy himself whatever he wanted, and in the end, his mother could still take it away. Being 15 sucks.

Matt went upstairs to his room and flopped on his bed. What could he possibly do for some fun? Sure, he had video games and TV and stuff. But what he really wanted was food, and lots of it. He had seen...well, he had found some magazines under his friend's dad's bed. It showed people eating more than Matt thought possible. And they really seemed to enjoy it. Matt wanted to try it, see what it was like. But who really wants to stuff themselves full of carrots or graham crackers? Matt knew right then and there that it had to be junk food. But how could he pull off getting that kind of stuff with his parents always watching him?

And just then, he knew how he could do it. The same way every kid in movies does-tell his parents he's going to a friend's house, have the friend vouch for him, and he's good. But wait-why not actually use one of his friends in this devious plan? His buddy Jack was always up for a fun plan. Plus, Jack's parents let him do practically anything. Matt picked up the phone.
111.title: Matt

choices: He wins! Send his parents (without the money) to... well... anywhere!
He wins! Send him (with the money) to... well... anywhere!
He loses again and has to find another way.
1112.content:
"Hey, Jack! I need a... weird sort of favor."
"This doesn't sound good. What?"
"I... um... how do I explain this?"
"Using words is always a good start."
"Screw you. I... uh... need your help."
"We've been over this already."
"...to put on weight."
"..."
"My parents would never let me and your parents would --"
"No. Hell no."
*click*

Well that was a bust. There went his place to stay and source of food. Once again left with nothing, he turned on the TV to think. Immediately a commercial came on advertising a lottery with a $101,000,000 dollar prize and an overseas getaway for two. Inspiration and hope struck immediately.

Entry price was $10, charged by phone. He dialed the number.
"Sorry, you've lost!"
Twice.
"Sorry, you've lost!"
Three times.
"Sorry, you've lost!"
The fifth would go over his limit, so he had to win on the fourth.
1112.title: Finding Another Way

choices: Day One: Fast Food, Faster Eating
11121.content:
"CONGRATULATIONS! YOU'VE WON THE GRAND PRIZE OF 101 MILLION DOLLARS AND A ROMANTIC GETAWAY FOR TWO!"
Despite his left ear being deafened, he sent them his bank account and his parents' email addresses with elation. He quickly heard a "woohoo" from downstairs, as well. Running down, he saw his parents jumping up and down in a circle, arms together and screaming.
"Why are you so excited?"
"WE WON A VACATION!"
"Really?! To where?!"
"THE FUJI ISLANDS! WE LEAVE TOMORROW!"
"I'll start getting packed," Matt said with a knowing grin.
"Uh... son... we need to talk," spoke the father alone.
"I've left the country before, guys."
"It's not that... it's a... uh... romantic getaway. For two."
"You're leaving me here?"
"We've been planning a second honeymoon for quite some time, and you're old enough to stay at home by yourself now."
"But I -"
"No "but"s. You're staying here. It'll be great! You can invite your friends over or something."
"Don't burn it down," his mother interjected humorously.
"Fine. But I'm not happy about it."
"We'll get you some new videogames or something." With one last feigned sigh from Matt, the argument was over. He'd have two months alone with over a hundred million dollars. God knows what he'd buy. Personal chefs from around the world! Thousands of burgers! More food than anyone could handle!
11121.title: Buh-Bye, Mom and Dad!

111212.content:
Matt wasn't stupid. The first thing he did was go out and buy clothes of every size and store them on the ground floor. He also got personal aides on standby, as well as a fake ID so he could drive around.

All of those preparations made him hungry! He drove down the local McDonny's and asked for three Big Whacks, all supersized. He immediately began to eat. Biting down, Matt realized he'd never eaten something so good in his life! Nothing he'd ever imagined tasted like this, oh it was glorious. He managed to eat half of the first one before he felt as if he'd explode. He brought the rest home and took a nap on the couch.

When he woke up, his stomach had stretched and emptied. He ate the rest of the first one and all of the fries that came with it, loving each bite as it slid down his throat. Again, however, he was full. His parents made good on their promise and he had a whole new system with an ensemble of games. He slid in Grand Theft Auto and went to town. All of a sudden his stomach growled. "That was fast," he thought out loud. This time he managed to polish off the rest of the food entirely, patting his belly as he finished.

He hadn't put on much weight as it were, but now his stomach understood that it had to hold it all. The stomach knew it was about to face war.
111212.title: Making Room

1112121.content:
He had plans. Big, big plans.

Matt put on a tight, button-down shirt. He swore he wouldn't stop eating today until he'd popped at least one button. Once again he drove out to the McDonny's. In the mirror he noticed he was pretty much the same size. Matt couldn't stand for this.

"TEN BIG WHACKS!" He barked at the poor cashier. "Er, sorry. I'd like ten big whacks, please." The cashier looked him over and wondered why such a skinny boy was buying such a fat order, but he didn't get paid to judge. They came quickly and Matt took them to his table.

He ravenously bit down on the first, and with new hunger, devoured it in seconds. He licked his fingers while the other hand brought the second to his face. "These are so good." he mumbled through bites, gorging down two more before slowing down and admiring the damage. "Man I feel full, but I swore to myself I wouldn't stop!" Still, he couldn't stomach another for the time being and instead ordered five large chocolate milkshakes. The cashier was watching as Matt guzzled them down, one by one. "Oh man that's good, five more please!" On the final milkshake he felt a large belch coming up. He burped (a new sensation) and felt like his stomach was once again empty. Down the hatch went the rest of the burgers and the accompanying fries. "Oh man, this is awesome, twenty more Big Whacks and shakes, please!"

While the kitchen staff was preparing he noticed that the shirt felt much tighter than it did when he arrived. Peeking through his collar, he noticed a considerable bulge where his flat stomach used to be. "Progress!" he whispered to the flab.

The food arrived, the cashier still utterly perplexed. Eyes glazed over by gluttony, he ate and ate and ate. He slowly filled the shirt more and more until at last, a button popped. It was at the 18th burger and 11th shake. He sighed with relief that his self-inflicted force-feeding was over and relaxed for the rest of this part of the meal.

As the twentieth of each went down his maw, a second button popped. "Whoa!" Matt exclaimed as a new challenge entered into his head. "What if I can remove the whole shirt with food?! 30 MORE SHAKES AND BURGERS, PLEASE!"

The cashier was alone no longer in his staring, part of the kitchen staff had come out to see the "starving skinny guy" and other patrons of the restaurant couldn't unglue their eyes either. Matt didn't notice, he was too busy daydreaming about how fat he could get by the end of the two months.

Out of the kitchen came the food and Matt began his binge. He gorged on burgers and fries until he couldn't stomach any more, then he chugged down milkshakes until he made more room. Burgers, shakes, burgers, shakes. He popped four buttons this time, leaving only four more. His stomach wasn't just peeking out from under his shirt now, it was a mass that sat on his thighs and jiggled with every twitch, every breath. He had love handles that pushed the shirt to his back. He had a second chin forming, as well. Today was a lovely start.

"Forty more of... oh you get it!" Down his gullet went the greasy, half-pound burgers. Into his maw went gallon after gallon of milkshake. Handful after handful he shoved fries into his mouth, gargling down ketchup as they went. "Victory!" he cried as he noticed his shirt had completely opened, revealing his new manboobs. He stood up from the table with a bit of trouble, his bare skin grazed the plastic. He walked up to the counter and asked for whatever they had left.

"Um... that was it."
"What?"
"You ate all of it."
"All of your burgers?"
"The milkshakes, too."
"I can't believe that,"
"Neither can I. Besides, as much as I like to watch you eat, I'm not allowed, no shirt, no shoes, you see,"
"Oh, well in that case I best be going."

Massive belly in tow, he waddled out the front door giddy with how much weight he put on in one day.
1112121.title: Cleaning Out McDonny's

choices: He heads home to eat his Hostess mountains immediately
11121211.content:
Matt made it home at 5:00. Tired from all that food, he sat on the couch to watch some TV. As he did, his jeans blew their button.

"Wow. I can really pack it away, now," he said as he slapped his belly. It wobbled and quivered excessively. He watched for around 30 minutes before a commercial came on advertising a new buffet downtown. He'd never been to one before, but the idea of "all you can eat" appealed to him at the moment. As the food flashed across the screen he became hungry again. He changed into a much more loose shirt, still with buttons. Matt planned to ruin this one as well. Before he changed, however, he called one of his aides and told him to bring back the entire Hostess aisle from the supermarket to his house. When he'd finished putting on new clothes, he went to the kitchen and saw the plethora of cakes. Twinkles, Dong-Dings, and a thousand miscellaneous knock-offs and whatnot were now in his kitchen. He told the aide to unwrap them all and (after sanitizing) put them all in the living room in massive piles.
"Yes, sir. After we get the rest unloaded from the truck."
"The truck?"
"You didn't specify which supermarket, so we got them all."
Amazed, he left for the buffet.

He arrived and was sat down quickly. He was told he could get as much food as he liked from the counters, but the waiters would refill his drink. He went up to the counters and, my, oh, my. It was overwhelming. Never before had he seen so much food in such a small area. He grabbed a plate and piled it on. Fried steak, fried chicken, fried fish, even fried ice cream. French fries, burgers, everything he'd dreamed of. He piled a foot or so of food on a total of four plates and brought them back to the booth. He didn't find silverware, so he just shoveled in into his maw with his hands. How he could eat! Mounds of food went down as a mound of fat went up. Still, even after his thirds and fourths, his shirt was only starting to look like it fit him. He got his fifths, sixths, and sevenths, no luck. The shirt only got a little bit tight. He guzzled down gallons of soft drinks he'd never tasted before, no luck.

This was when he saw the dessert bar. It was the largest thing in the store. He remembered the words "dessert buffet" from the commercial and realized he'd been eating their "appetizers" this whole time. He stood up (with some difficulty) and went over. He piled on 10 pies on three plates and a whole 4-layer cake on another. He got six tubs of chocolate ice cream covered in caramel and chocolate syrup. Matt began to scoop the desserts into his mouth. He ate the apple pie first, then the cherry, then two of the chocolate mousse ones, and then a layer from the cake, then he drank down a gallon of ice cream. At last a button popped. He finished this course of dessert and two more snapped. He went up for more and more and even after his shirt exploded off of him he kept eating. Matt was addicted.

The glutton was finally full. He had three chins and his massive stomach hung off all sides of his legs. He was considering cleaning the place out when the waiting staff had the courage to tell him to go home. No shirt, no shoes, you see. He grabbed one of their three-layer cakes for the ride home and was off.
11121211.title: Obligatory Buffet Chapter

choices: He Eats Some More and Goes to Sleep (Day 2)
111212112.content:
Matt drove home with some difficulty, his stomach was in between him and the entire HUD. If he coughed the horn would go off and the car would veer slightly in either direction.

"This is amazing" he continued to mutter to himself as he went over bumps and saw himself jiggle.

Of course the glutton was hungry before he was even halfway home, and by the time was, it was more ravenous and insane with greed than actual hunger.

"Oh, hello sir! Back from the buffet, I presume?" greeted the servant.
"Wha - why are you still here?"
"We're still unloading all the snack cakes."
"For two hours?! How far did you go to get these?"
"All adjacent towns and no further, sir."
"I... oh wow. I'm going in."
"I advise you go through the garage. The door is wider and the cakes aren't as numerous there."

While what the servant said was true, after Matt opened the door, he was still knee deep in snack cakes. He closed the door and waddled through to the living room, where he couldn't get in there was so much food. This was when an idea struck - the entire house is somewhat tilted all towards the basement. He waddled as quickly as he could down there, shoveling cake into his maw as he went. The basement was filled entirely, so Matt dug it all out with his stomach. He dove in jaws mindlessly opening and closing. More and more preservative-enhanced food went down his throat and his gut certainly showed. It distended out feet in front of him and on his sides. His pants exploded off of him with the remainder of his shirt as hundreds of Hostess muffins, cakes, frostings and fillings went down his gaping mouth.
111212112.title: Twinkie Futures Up 10%

1112121121.content: Matt ate cakes throughout the night and into the morning, the servant having to bring the cakes to him as Matt was too lazy to move. By mid afternoon Matt had eaten all the cakes. When he looked down he saw that his mid-section had ballooned. He struggled up then staggered, almost falling but he steadied himself using a wall. He inspected his body, where he could once see abs was now a ball of lard, he was unable to see his crotch or feet when he looked down, and the sudden gain in weight meant that his legs could not support his weight that well. He set off to go to the bathroom to find a set of scales, a trip that would have previously taken 30 seconds to a minute took him 34 minutes. He had sweat pouring from his body and was panting He stepped onto the scales, he had gone from a healthy weight of 126 lbs to a weight of 204 lbs. Obese! Over 24hrs of almost non stop eating had paid off!
1112121121.title: He Eats it All

11121211211.content:
A downside to a sudden gain of 78 lbs is that none of his clothes fitted, he was walking around naked. He decided to call his servant to get him a larger set of clothes, and to get him some pizzas, unhealthy, fatty, greasy, calorie enriched pizzas, the way any gainer wants his food.

His servant obeyed, coming back with clothes which Matt got into. Matt asked where the pizzas were, the servant said to follow him downstairs. When e got down the stairs after some labour he was astounded by what was in the lounge. There were pizzas piled high on the couch, bags of fries covering the floor and burgers on the bookshelves. Matt cried out in delight and began to feast. The servant fed Matt and brought in more food from the truck, this carried on throughout and the night and for another...
11121211211.title: Clothes...!

11123.content:
Four times.
"Sorry you've lost!"

'Blast' thought Matt. He'd wasted all his money and hadn't won the prize. 'I guess there are no easy fixes.' he thought.

Then it struck him, perhaps he could convince his parents that he should get a job. If he could get one he would have the money he needed to buy the junk food he craved and being out of the house would give him the opportunity to eat it without his parents knowing.
11123.title: He loses again and has to find another way.

choices: "...maybe, you need to ask your father."
"...no way!  You've got exams coming up."
111231.content:
It was approaching 8pm but Matt left his room and went to find his parents to ask about getting a job. It was in the kitchen that he found his mother tidying up, his mother was a cleaning nut and Thursday nights were always kitchen cleaning night. His mother went over every surface cleaning and polishing everything until it shone and not a microbe or germ was left. The smell of disinfectant tinged with citrus was in the air.

"Hey, Mom." said Matt entering the kitchen.

His mom was just wiping down the draining board and sink, the last items in her routine. "Don't touch anything! I've just cleaned."

This was the usual kind of way his parents expressed their affection by telling him what he shouldn't be doing. Matt found it incredibly frustrating and irritating, on this occasion he was only just inside the kitchen.

"Mom? I've been thinking."

"Hmm?" queried his mother.

"You remember you said recently that I spent too much time playing on my video games and watching television, well, umm... I was thinking that I might look at, umm... getting a job?"

"Oh..."
111231.title: Go speak to his parents about getting a job

choices: "Why not.  Anything that stops you mooching around the house is a good thing."
"Certainly not.  You've got your education to think about, exams coming up."
1112311.content:
"Oh maybe, you need to ask your father." responded his mother.

This was her usual tactic, very rarely did she ever make an important decision without deferring to her husband's judgment.

Matt said, "Okay."

He turned and exited the kitchen and went into the lounge to find his father. His father was in his armchair surrounded by note books and paperwork. Thursday evenings were when his Dad balanced his accounts and looked at his budget. Matt wasn't really sure what the point of his father's activity was, as they always seemed to have enough money and never appeared to be worried about finances.

"Dad...umm." started Matt.

"Hang on. I'm just totaling up this column." his Dad interjected quickly and then resumed his calculation.

Matt ambled over to the sofa and sat down and waited for his Dad to finish. He tried to think of what would be the best arguments to use with his Dad to get him to agree to him finding a job. Eventually his father marked the column's total with a pencil and looked at his son.

"What do you want now?" asked his father, yet again demonstrating the affection and warmth which Matt had come to expect.

"Umm, well, you know haw sometimes Mom and you say I spend too much time playing video games or watching television..." began Matt.

"Yes." said his father.

"Well, I, umm, thought that, well... I might try to find a job."

112.content:
Dan made his way through the hallway away from the lunchroom and to his locker. Dan was one of the star players on the football team and his tall and broad frame weighed in at 217 pounds of pure muscle. Dan had everything, the looks, the body, the girl, and even a car along with a good amount of financial weight. The only thing he didn't have a perfect score in was his grade but he got along without too much trouble.
Dan was actually glad that lunch was over, for nearly a week it seemed that nearly everyone was looking at him, not staring but small glances in his direction. It had all started with a few whispers about him. It wasn't too serious of a rumor but everyone who loved gossip leaped at the one flaw in Dan. Everyone wanted to see the best to have a flaw and bring them down to their level. The only reason it ws at all troubling was that it was true.The rumor was simple, almost childish.
Just then Dan heard a quiet comment saying...
112.title: Dan

choices: a new girl that would accept his less physical condition
study, he would need academics if he wanted to graduate
find new friends that don't mind his physical inability
1121.content:
Dan wanted to whirl around to see the culprit and beat him into a pulp, but his cast and crutches prevented him from taking such action. His temper had grown significantly with his frustration since he had been put into the leg cast nearly a week before. He had been immediately kicked off the football team since he couldn't play, and considering the time he would be recovering, he wouldn't be able to play basketball either. This efficiently brought the school's star jock's sports career to a screeching halt.
Dan's social life was left in metaphorical ruins. His girlfriend had dumped him in favor of a more capable jock, and most of the girls that would cluster and giggle while looking at him lustfully had moved on. Most of his friends no longer wanted to hang out with him, since his injury would 'hold them back' from most forms of entertainment. The only times Dan socialized now was across the internet and at small gatherings between his friends to play video games. He was only at those because he, being rich, had the best and latest games that the gang wanted to play.
In addition to Dan's now socially depraved life, his personal life was also in shambles. He could no longer work out-not only was it impractical with his leg, but both the school and his doctor forbade it. That given, he would no longer be able to qualify for any sports scholarships. He would need one too, since his grades had never been the greatest and his performance had declined since the accident.
Dan was now in a worse position than he had ever been in before, and it was only the beginning of the year! Since it was his senior year, he wouldn't have a next year to fall back on and regain his status. Dan knew he needed to pull his life back together and had to start somewhere, and he knew just where he would start and why........
1121.title: Why the Cast

Dan gets even more hungry and decides to order a 2nd Big Mac.

Dan decided that to start bringing his life back was to start getting better grades.Dan decided he would start studying for all his upcoming tests more, even starting this afternoon. One thing Dan dosen't realize that he does is that when he studies he always eats at the same time and he would starting that too.

Later at Mcdonalds, Dan is studying and eating his Big Mac when........

Dan twitched in response to the comment. He had started using steroids only about a month ago and it was already known by nearly everyone. Sure he had a few pimples but, most had already been there and he didn't exactly show any other signs of use. Someone must have seen him jack up. Who it could have been, Dan had no idea. However that was irrelevant at this point and soon enough someone would rat him out. It was only a matter of time.

1123.content:
Dan resisted the urge to laugh. Out of all the things to talk about people chose to gossip over his eating habits. How trivial could people be?
Dan had taken up a job, despite being rich, since his parents didn't spoil him entirely and made him pay for several things himself. He paid for his own gas, any games he wanted, the more expensive garments such as his athletes shoes, and the amount he had for food was set to only about ten dollars a week for lunch and a small breakfast and dinner at home. In fact if his parents hadn't bought his car most people would have thought he was poor without seeing his house, which also wasn't extravagant.
Dan earned nearly seven dollars an hour by now and put thirty percent of each dollar into a savings account. The next thirty percent went into gas money, followed by the next ten which went into a seperate pile to be spent on games later. Another twenty went into gifts and dinners with his girlfriend Samantha. The rest of the money, only ten percent, went into extra food at lunch and a snack to go along with his dinner. That ten percent, very little when put into perspective had brought this rumour down on his head.
Dan hurried to get through the crowded halls and on with his simple life.
1123.title: Money Matters

Dan got out his cellphone and called his boss

Dan turned off his phone and had a huge grin on his face.

The next day he stopped by the restaurant and Mr. Rickson called him in his office and he told Dan that we should first talk about the
11231.title: Dan's job begins to demand longer hours

112311.content:
"Dan," Mr. Rickson extended a hand to the young man and shook it firmly. "It's good to see you open to this opportunity. Right now business is booming and while I get some employee issues handled we are short staffed. I think with your help we are about to turn the corner."
"My pleasure, Mr. Rickson." Dan smiled. It was his first time meeting with the boss one to one and Dan's anxiety had gone away with the warm welcome. Mr. Rickson had always seemed so superior and aloof- even unfriendly but today he was smiling and warm.
"Because of the short staffing, I hope you will be flexible. I may need you to pick up the slack wherever until we get fully staffed."
"No problem." Dan answered. "I'll be happy to work whatever you need."
"That's why I offered the promotion, Dan. I think you can be a big help. Sit down."
Mr. Rickson unbuttoned his suit jacket which had been rather tighly stretched over a beginner gut and sat down in his chair. Hs belly pooched forward. jiggling softly as he talked.
"Normally, I'd want someone with your looks in hospitality, making a good first impression on our guests but right now I've got a more pressing problem."
Unconsiously, Mr. Rickson rubbed his belly before continuing.
"We are loosing money hand over fist in the bar. I think somebody is giving away drinks. I fired the bartender and hired a new one but still the revenues are not covereing the expenses. I'd like you to inventory the bar and track revenues against the orders."
After some minutes discussing the task, Mr. Rickson rose and rebuttoned his snug suit jacket.
"I'll do my best." Dan told him.
"I know you will." Mr. Rickson said.
112311.title: the job position in the restaurant

choices: Dan likes the look of Roger's butt.
1123111.content:
Dan surveyed the spreadsheet inventorying the bar. It amazed him how many different kinds of alcohol they stocked. Now he could monitor the stock on a daily basis. Mr. Rickson had intorduced him the the bar staff only as preforming and audit. Now he decided to get better acquanted with the employees. The bartender was middle aged, going grey, bald and bottom heavy. He'd probably been a looker 15 years ago but now he seemed to ideal barman. The kind of man you wouldn't hesitate to unburden your problems on. Pudgy, friendly and non-threatening was how Dan saw Roger. But while Roger seemed not too bright, underneath that bland facade, the wheels were turning. Roger had figured out that he's been hired because of some shady dealings by his predecessor. Now seeing Dan carefully counting the stock, Roger wanted to know what was up.
"Does old Rick always keep such a close eye on the stock?" Roger bantered.
Dan was surprised at the question. Were Roger and Mr. Rickson friends? He eyed the bartender and when smiled. No reason to share his task with the help.
"Mr. Rickson likes to run a tight ship." he answered.
Roger grinned. "He does seem a bit anal. He installed a new system to monitor sales. Kind of a pain at first but you get used to it. Makes it hard for the barkeep to provide hospitality to the patrons."
Dan waited.

Brad led Dave into the restaurant. From it’s name, The Cuckoo, Dave wasn’t sure what kind of restaurant it might be. Inside, it was a sophisticated white and dark wood motif with a dramatic cuckoo clock in the reception area. Brad marched on accompanied by the hostess and soon they were seated in a corner booth surveying the menu. It seemed The Cuckoo was a German restaurant with all the traditional dishes and Brad after some consulting with the hostess ordered for them both. Soon they were drinking German beer and catching up on the years since they had last been together.

By the time the food arrived, they were well into their second pitcher of beer. Dave was amazed to see a family sized platter of savory sauerbraten accompanied by bowls of red cabbage and spaetzle. Brad immediately dug in, savoring the succulent meat and side dishes and was quickly demolished his first heaping plate and reloaded. Dave was still working on his first plate when Brad wiped the last of the sauce from the serving plate and paused.

“You probably remember that I wasn’t much of an eater in high school.” Brad commented. “My mother was a lousy cook. Everything was tasteless and overcooked and so I never realized that food was supposed to taste good. That’s why I was so scrawny. I never thought anything about it and I was never such a scarecrow that I couldn’t get a date so I was fine until I got to college and started loosing my hair. That got me scared.”

Just then Brad stopped. His eyes focused across the room where a server was approaching with more food. Brad immediately focused on the platter of potato pancakes accompanied with sour cream and applesauce and dug in when the plate was set before him. Dave had a plate as well although he was full from his share of the sauerbraten and he picked while Brad wolfed down his and then smiled as he saw the server approaching with two more plates.

“They need to be hot off the griddle to be at their best,” he explained to Dave. “So I asked them to bring them in batches.”

Dave watched in wonderment as his old friend finished his second plate, then Dave’s second plate and finally the rest of Dave’s first plate. Then with a contented expression on his face, he pushed the plates away, belched quietly and continued.

“ Anyway, I decided that a wimpy guy with a comb over was not going to be any girls idea of a hot date.
I put myself on a serious weight training program, forced myself to eat lots of healthy, tasteless food and shaved my head. It took two years to add 25 pounds of muscle to my boney frame but by my junior year I felt pretty good. At 195 pounds and 10 percent body fat, I wasn’t a 10 but I did alright with the ladies.

I still had to force myself to eat to maintain that weight but once I bulked up it wasn’t nearly so hard to maintain. After college my first job was pretty pedestrian. Just deskwork.”

Brad’s attention was again diverted when another server approached with more food. This time is was a savory platter of sauerkraut with pork chops, apples and sausages. Dave couldn’t see how anyone could eat any more food but Brad plowed right in. He slowed a bit with the last of the sausages but the heaping platter was reduced to pork chop bones in short order.

Breathing a little heavy, Brad sighed, let his belt out and continued.

“But than last year I got a new assignment that meant traveling to work with our clients in designing and managing restaurants. They wanted me to understand and appreciate the food they were serving in order to do the best marketing and packaging of their restaurants. I told them they were wasting their time because I just didn’t appreciate food. They insisted so I began to sample the food my clients were serving. I had never tasted anything so good in my life and before long I was hooked on good food.”

“Hooked,” Dave was thinking. He had never seen such a display of unabashed gluttony in his life. Where did Brad put all that food.

“So you’ve go the perfect job?” Dave commented, observing that there was now a definite ledge of bulging belly under Brad’s muscular chest which he hadn’t noticed before.

“Life is good.” Brad responded. “I don’t have any trouble keeping my weight up anymore. In fact, I have gained 20 pounds over the last year.”

He patted his now very prominent belly with evident pride.

Mark stretched luxuriously in his recliner and grabbed another chip. What a plain Saturday he'd had! A morning spent out in the field, checking if the test site had lost its snow cover, then an afternoon spent on errands, laundry...and now, a beer and chips and a video. Three years into his career, he was just starting to find life lonely - through the hard slog of three degrees, he'd always had friends and fellow students, but now, with a research fellowship, he only saw a handful of people, and most of those were in the lab. When he'd moved to take this job, he knew he was leaving most of his grad student friends behind, but he figured there'd be new friends - and there weren't many, not really. Oh, there was a class full of students to teach, but they were all so young...and that was unethical, anyway.

So, here he was, a lonely Saturday night. He looked through the pile of mail that had accumulated over the week, and found a notice from a local church, listing an Easter morning drama service, followed by lunch. When he was a kid, he'd gone to church most Sundays with his parents, but except for visits with them, and a wedding during grad school, he'd hardly darkened a church door since. Maybe he should go? He remembered there were always young people around his parents' church, and this one didn't sound too extreme - how far out could Methodists get, anyway? So, with nothing better to do for tomorrow, and a nagging sense of loneliness, he decided to go.

The next morning, Mark hesitated long and hard over what to wear. A suit? His father had often worn a suit, but he hated it when he had to, as a boy. Was it expected? He finally settled on a jacket over chinos, with a white shirt, no tie. Looking at himself in the mirror, he thought he looked intelligent, and approachable, and if the jacket was too much he could chuck it. At first Scott thought he was about to be scolded for taking so long at lunch, but Randy had the same easygoing look as always, so he relaxed a bit. Randy was a year or two older than Scott, with light brown hair and eyes. He looked to be familiar with the idea of enjoying his lunch, judging by how his current ex-jock body compared to his college graduation picture.

"Sir, you were looking for me?"

"We have a bit of a bind here and I hope I can count on you to help us out."

Scott was surprised at the serious tone from his laid-back boss but it was encouraging as well. It never seemed that Randy considered Scott as a key employee despite Scott's efforts to impress him.

142211111122.content:
Randy came around and perched himself on an empty corner of Scott's desk. "Well you know Cindy's retiring at the end of the month right? That opens up the position of office manager. Now it's not that huge of a step up, but you're welcome to it. On one condition."

"And what's that," asked Scott.

"You've just gotta learn to live a little man," Randy said, putting a big hand on Scott's shoulder. "Cindy only did so well because she wasn't so uptight. You shoulda seen the girl before her. It's better for everyone if you enjoy yourself a bit."

He let his hand linger a moment longer before removing it and getting to his feet. "Tell you what, lemme take you out for dinner and a drink and we'll go over the details. Call it a guy's night out."

At this point, Scott was desperate for a change, regardless of how small it might be. He hoisted himself out of his chair and gripped Randy's hand. "Where should I meet you?"
142211111122.title: Promotion

1422111111221.content:
Instead of the type of upscale restaurant Scott had been expecting, Randy had suggested that they meet at some sports bar a few blocks from the office. It didn't look like much from the outside. Parking his car in the closest available spot, Scott made his way inside.

He was rather surprised by the place. It wasn't overly impressive, but it did have an undeniable quaintness about it. Unlike the more popular places he'd been dragged to in the recent past, it wasn't loud or flashy. Speakers were emitting classic tunes at just the right volume, and the calm conversations provided a pleasant backdrop. As he headed towards the table where he'd spotted Randy, Scott decided that this was definitely a place that he could see himself visiting more often.

Randy looked up from the menu as Scott took the seat across from him. "Good to see ya. Ever been here before?"

"No. I've never even heard of this place before," Scott said as he opened his own menu. It listed everything expected of such a place, but the descriptions and occasional pictures made it all seem delicious. "Looks like a nice place though. Is the food as good as they make it sound?"

"Better," replied Randy, brows knit in concentration. "I can never decide what to order. I can get it down to two things, but then I get stuck." As he continued to stare at the menu, his belly gave an audible rumble. "Guess I'd better decide soon, huh!"

Scott grinned, relieved that he wasn't the only one who was starving. He'd been afraid that his own stomach would start growling any moment. "Well what are you looking at? I don't know what's good and I'm willing to share."

"Nah, it looks like you enjoy your food almost as much as I do. I wouldn't want either of us going hungry." Randy gave his gut an affectionate pat. "Tell you what, I'll just..."
1422111111221.title: That Evening

Get some appetizers going while we decide on the serious stuff.

Randy waved at the waiter and quickly ordered chicken wings and potato skins. As the waiter turned, he added, "And bring me another beer and one for my friend."

Randy was looking at Scott for approval as he ordered. Scott gave a quick nod at the beer. He was feeling more relaxed already.

By the time the appetizers arrived, both men were ready for another beer. Scott marveled at the size of the platters.

"This place really takes their appetizers seriously". he mused.

Randy wasted no timed digging into the wings with Scott following and by the fourth round of beers, Randy was wiping up the remains of the sauce with the last of the potato skins.

Wiping the grease off his cheeks, Randy motioned again for the waiter.

14221111112211.title: Order an appetizer too

142211111122112.content:
"I'm gonna be havin' the pasta," said Randy. He leaned back in his seat and loosened his collar a bit. "Sorry if you're not ready yet but my gut can't wait any longer for the main course."

Scott returned Randy's grin. "No, it's fine. I'm gonna stick with tradition and go with a cheeseburger." He took a sip from the new mug that the waiter had returned with while Randy gave them their orders. The service was quick, and their meals were placed before them by the time he'd drained half his glass. Randy had emptied his.

"This thing is huge," Scott said as he admired the girth of the burger that was placed before him. He hardly believed that his mouth would open that wide. His boss didn't seem to have any similar problem with what was placed before him. He sat hunched over a plate holding three different heaps of pasta; each looked large enough to be a meal in and of itself. Even so, Randy was working his way through the first pile without any obvious strain.

Well, if there was one thing that Scott had proven over the last week or so, it was that he could handle himself at the dinner table. It turned out that the burger was just the right size for him. Leaning over the plate to keep the grease from falling onto his shirt, Scott went to work on his meal.

He finished the burger in time to catch Randy grabbing a handful of fries from his basket. "Haven't had enough yet?"

"Just about! You were just taking so long with that burger I thought I'd help you out here. Hate to see good food go to waste." Chuckling, Scott brought a pair of steak fries to his mouth. Between the beer, the appetizers, and the large main course, he was pretty full. Still, he hated to waste food just as much as his boss did.

"So, what do you say to..."
142211111122112.title: The Pasta medley

1422111111221121.content:
"What the hell, a while longer won't hurt anything," Scott said, waving for the waiter. "Did you want to talk about the job now?"

Randy just sprawled in his chair with his big hands resting on his belly. Scott thought for a moment that his boss hadn't heard him, but, after a few deep breaths, he spoke up. "Scott, don't ruin my food buzz by talking about work. Sit back and relax for a minute. Enjoy the full feeling."

Adopting a similar pose in his own chair, Scott allowed his eyes to drift closed for a moment. His belly was warm and delightfully full as it rested on his lap. He was feeling great, pleasantly drowsy and more relaxed than he'd been in a while. His eyes opened as a newly filled mug was placed in front of him.

Scott and Randy spent another two hours talking and drinking before calling for a cab. As he weaved his way into his house, Scott thought back to the fun he'd had that evening. He never would have thought that he and his boss could have so much in common. It had even been more fun to share a hearty meal with another man who knew how to indulge his appetite.
1422111111221121.title: Ending the Evening

14221111112211211.content:
The work week ended before Scott got a chance to actually talk to Randy about his new position. He'd planned on cornering his boss in the break room that Friday. The two of them often ran into each other several times a day as they went to help themselves to the treats and baked goods that various office workers brought in to garner good will with each other. Scott made his way there three times that day, but each time he returned with nothing to show for his trip beyond an admittedly mouth-watering wedge from someone's birthday cake. Randy must have decided to take the day off; there was no way he's miss out on such a tempting treat.

The weekend was going to be a great time to relax. Each of the kids were supposed to be out of the house until Sunday evening, either for some school outing or a sleepover with a friend. Even his wife was planning on abandoning him in favor of a spa trip with a few of her girl friends. Secretly, Scott always kind of looked forward to these times when he had the house to himself. It gave him a chance to relive his glory days as a bachelor without having to give up the benefits of married wife. For one thing, he mused as he gave his gut a shake, I certainly eat much better.

Now all he had to do was decide how best to spend his family-free time. It would be the perfect opportunity for Scott to defy his wife's ridiculous new one-restaurant-outing-per-week restriction without having to be cunning. He'd been getting around his wife's attempts to put him on a diet pretty well up until now, but it was a bit of an inconvenience to have to craft a convincing lie every time he felt like swinging through the drive-thru at McDonalds.

That was tempting, but there was something alluring about the idea of spending as much of the weekend as possible parked in front of the television. He'd be able to recline in his easy chair in nothing but his boxers and an old t-shirt, with just the remote, a bottle of beer and a pile of greasy take-out food to keep him company, just how God intended.
14221111112211211.title: That Weekend

choices: Grab a conveniently placed old bathrobe
142211111122112112.content:
In the end Scott decided that he was feeling way too lazy to get dressed and head out into the world. What sense was there in going out into the cool fall air when he had everything he needed within reach of his soft, warm couch? The only thing left to do what decide what kind of take-out he was going to call for. He leaned forward with a grunt and retrieved the stack of menus that had been gathering dust ever since his wife had gone crazy.

It had been weeks since the last time he'd had Chinese, so he picked up the phone and dialed the restaurant. Just reading through the menus had been enough to rouse his appetite, and he stroked his naked, hairy gut absentmindedly as he thought about just what to order. He knew what he liked; the problem was that there was so much of it.

What the hell, he thought after trying unsuccessfully to decide what to drop from the lunchtime lineup. He was a free man this weekend, and there was no reason for a man not to eat however much he wanted. Promptly shutting up the part of his brain that was warning him of what Laura would say if she heard what he was about to order, Scott proceeded to instruct the woman on he other end of the phone.

Scott was a bit surprised when he looked back on all that he had ordered. Maybe his newfound temporary freedom had gone to his head? His belly rumbled in anticipation, but he wasn't sure that he was going to be able to put it all away. A full order of both chicken and beef fried rice, a heaping helping of beef lo mein, six eggrolls and an order of sweet & sour chicken was a pretty big meal for one man of even Scott's thick frame.

Well, I'll just have to do my best he thought as he stood to answer the doorbell. He was half way there when he remembered that he wasn't wearing anything but his boxers.
142211111122112112.title: Stay In

1422111111221121121.content:
Scott was just about at the door when it occurred to him just how close to naked he currently was. He hadn't answered the door in nothing but an old pair of boxers in years, and he had almost certainly been at least twenty pounds slimmer back then. Still, there was nothing around for him to cover up with and he didn't want to risk having his order carried away by an impatient delivery guy.

Calling upon what bravado remained from his days as a jock, he confidently pulled the door open. Somehow he managed not to blush when he saw that it was a pretty young woman carrying his lunch (all three bags of it) instead of the pimply teenaged guy he had been expecting. There was no way he could miss the way her eyes lingered on his belly. Scott could imagine what kind of sight he made right now; a 40-something man standing in his doorway with his fat belly sticking out over his tight boxers and forcing the waistband to ride low beneath its curve.

Scott turned his away from the delivery girl to carry his bags of take-out to the coffee table, very aware of just how well his rear end was filling out his boxers. Gotta be sure to tip the poor girl really good, he thought with a quiet chuckle.

"Thanks a lot sir. Enjoy your meal," the girl said politely as she took her payment with a smile. Even if it was fake she had earned her hefty tip.

Scott's belly rumbled insistently at her words. Instead of feeling embarrassed, he just gave his soft belly a couple pats and grinned. "You bet I will."

I must've looked like some kind of slob, he thought as he made his way back to the couch after closing the door behind the girl. For some reason, the embarrassment that he had expected to feel during and long after that encounter had never showed up, even though he could still feel his boxers stretching slightly around his backside and thick thighs. As a matter of fact, Scott was becoming aware of the way that something else was stretching his boxers.
1422111111221121121.title: Who cares?  Answer the door

1422111111221122.content:
"So," Randy began once they had both drained a final beer, "how do you feel about sharing a cab? We're goin' the same way, right?"

Scott hadn't planned on drinking as much as he did this evening, but there was no denying that the beer had left him just a bit drunk. Even the large amount of food he'd put away couldn't negate the effects of the beer. He wasn't sure, but he had a suspicion that Randy had even drank more than he did. Randy was the bigger guy, even with Scott's newly-added poundage, but there was no way he was sober enough to drive.

"Sound's like a plan," Scott said as he got to his feet, feeling a bit unsteady. Maybe he'd downed more beer than he'd thought, or maybe all that food was contributing to his buzz. He followed Randy's broad back out to the street, noticing that his boss was weaving at least as much as he was.

They found an empty cab pretty easily. The bar was a pretty popular place for people to hit up after a long day of work. It didn't take long for the cabs to learn that they could make a good business by driving those people home. Randy held the door open before following him into the back seat. There wasn't as much room to spread out as Scott would have liked and his leg ended up pressed firmly against his boss's thick thigh. They reclined in silence for several minutes: the only sounds being their heavy breathing and the occasional loud belch.

Scott's eyes had drifted closed before Randy finally spoke. "Ya know Scott, I knew you were a good worker or I wouldn't have offered you that job, but you're a pretty good guy." He was quiet for another moment before he continued. "I actually had a real good time with you tonight."

Randy had moved closer as he was speaking and there was now only a couple inches between the tips of their noses. His boss was so close that Scott could smell his beery breath, yet only a sense of mild surprise managed to pierce his drowsy contentment.

"I had a great time too," Scott said as he lazily draped his arm over Randy's shoulders. "Totally worth the hell I'm gonna catch from my wife when I come home drunk. She don't understand that I'd rather hang out with other guys sometimes."

"Stop at my place. I got coffee if you wanna try to sober up a bit. Hell, take my couch if you want, bud."
1422111111221122.title: Sharing a cab

choices: Randy puts an arm over Scott's shoulders
14221111112211221.content:
Scott removed his arm from around his boss's shoulders, giving him a clumsy pat on the way. The rest of the trip was pretty short and they passed it quietly. Normally he would be worried about making his wife even angrier, but he actually liked Randy and she was going to be pissed either way.

Maybe it had just been a case of greener grass that had him fooled, but Scott had expected Randy's house to be large and fancy. Instead, the cab stopped in front of a large apartment building. It wasn't a bad building, but it wasn't nearly as lavish a place as he'd imagined. His place was up a few flights of stairs, on the fifth floor. Scott automatically headed for the elevator, but Randy put a hand on his shoulder. "Thing's broke. We're gonna have to hoof it up there."

The first flight of stairs was nothing for the pair, but Scott hadn't made it half way up the second flight before he began to breathe a bit heavily. Towards the top of the third flight, he began to hear his boss panting ahead of him. When they finally got to Randy's floor, they were both out of breath. and sweat had even begun to bead up on Randy's forehead.

"Hate them stairs," Randy puffed, wiping his brow with a forearm. Scott merely nodded, deciding to save his breath.

They stopped at a door halfway down the hall and Randy fumbled in his pockets for his keys. He threw his jacket to the side upon entering the apartment, motioning for Scott to do the same. It became quickly apparent that this was not the home of a neat freak. There were dishes waiting to be washed in the sink and boxes and cartons from takeout places littering the counter in his small kitchen. A few more containers sat on the table in front of the sofa.

"Hope you weren't expecting much. I ain't big on housekeeping." Randy sounded normal, but the way he snatched at the empty cartons on the table seemed embarrassed. His face was too ruddy to be sure either way.

"I like it. This is how men are supposed to live," Scott said with a grin. It was true too. He actually liked the way Randy had his home set up. It even reflected its owner's personality: laid back and comfortable.

"I'll warn ya now, I'm no good with anything in this kitchen except the food in the fridge," he said as he began to fiddle with the coffee maker. "I usually get my mornin' fix when I hit the McDonalds on the way to work. That's what's worst about bein' divorced. Mornin' coffee was one of the few things my ex was good for."

They headed into the living area to wait for the coffee, Randy yanking his tie off and unbuttoning the top few buttons of his shirt on the way. Scott could see dark patches of sweat beneath his arms. "I'm dyin' in these clothes. I ain't gonna offend you if I lose this dress shirt, am I?"

Scott took a seat on the small sofa as Randy shrugged his way out of the shirt. He tossed it on top of a pile of discarded clothes in one of the corners of the room before dropping onto the couch next to Scott and flipping on the television. The sofa was a two-seater and he could feel the heat radiating from Randy's body, but it wasn't just his body heat that was warming Scott up. His big boss's thick lovehandle was pressed against his own fleshy side. Scott loosened his own collar a bit.
14221111112211221.title: Randy's Place

choices: Next day at work; Randy wants to talk
Next day at work; nothing unusual
142211111122112212.content:
Doing his best to ignore his boss's warm flesh pressing into his side, Scott turns his attention to the sports channel that Randy had flipped to. The clips served as a pretty good distraction and before he knew it Randy heaved himself up from the couch to get their coffee. He returned with the pot, two mugs and some packets of cream and sugar, all of which he placed directly onto the wooden coffee table. Scott grinned inwardly as he imagined what his wife would do if someone put those things right on her wooden furniture.

"Black's probably the best choice if we're gonna sober up quick," Randy said. His face was still flushed and his eyes remained bleary. Scott wondered if the mountain of food that his boss had consumed was adding to the effect of all that beer like it was in him. Still, it was a comfortable buzz, he thought with an inward shrug.

Randy handed a mug to Scott just as a new set of clips from the latest big football game appeared on the television. They both reclined in the sofa to get comfortable, the heat generated by Randy's body starting to make Scott feel a bit light headed. He felt a hand resting on his left shoulder, but didn't think anything of it as he leaned over and continued to watch the game. It took a commercial break to snap him out of the trance.

The first thing he noticed was that he was comfortably warm despite leaving his coffee sitting on the table. Looking over to his left, Scott spotted Randy's big paw resting on his upper arm. Slowly, it dawned on him that he was being held comfortably within the crook of the other man's arm. Scott knew that Randy was a pretty physical person who wasn't afraid of touching, but this was rather extreme. Still, Randy was pretty drunk and, between the warmth from Randy and his overstuffed belly, he was more inclined to stay put.

He tried to think back to the last time he and his wife had been so close. He couldn't remember the last time they'd exchanged anything more than a quick hug or a peck on the cheek. It was funny in a way that Scott was getting more comfort from his boss than what his wife had given him in a long time. He gave a mental shrug before scooting closer and placing a hand on Randy's full, soft belly.

I wonder what he'll think of this when he sobers up, if he remembers it at all, Scott thought. Hell, I wonder what I'll think of it...
142211111122112212.title: Heating Up

choices: "That was nice, but lets not get carried away."
1422111111221122121.content:
Scott seriously considered calling in sick the next day. He had no idea what he would say if Randy approached him about their cuddle time last night. He was convinced that it had simply been the result of an awkward mixture of beer and chronic dissatisfaction over the state of his love life. That was all well and good for him, but it wasn't something that most employees would like to talk to their bosses about. Still, if he didn't show up then he would just be giving Randy a reason to have to address last night's events. Why ruin the chance that he wouldn't say anything?

In the end, Scott wound up scurrying to his desk and trying his best to look very, very busy. That alone was difficult enough because of the boring nature of his job, and soon it was complicated by the growling of his unsatisfied belly. On the days when he wasn't nervously avoiding his boss, who also liked to take full advantage of free treats, he would have made at least a couple trips there by this time of day. Still, it had been months since Scott had been able to make it through a morning without a bearclaw or two. He would be needing a refill of coffee if he was going to keep up the slog through the tedium that was his work anyway.

He waited for a lull in what passed for the office's mid-morning bustle before leaving his desk. Getting to the breakroom without running into anyone was easy, but there was no way for him to know who was in there without going in himself. Hopefully Randy had had a hearty breakfast that morning and wouldn't be looking for a snack.

Scott let out a relieved sigh upon entering the empty break room. Not only had he managed to avoid his boss so far, but he was rewarded with a nearly complete coffee cake. The wedge he took was even larger than usual, nearly a fourth of what was there. He was going to need something to calm his nerves.

"Have you been avoiding me Scott?" asked a voice from behind him. Moving up next to him, Randy slapped Scott's shoulder amiably. He grinned and said...
1422111111221122121.title: Next day at work; Randy wants to talk

choices: "Half off the price of their meals."
"A contest.  Eat enough and get free food for a month."
1422111111221122122.content:
Scott walked into work the next day feeling nervous. He had no idea what to expect from his boss after a night that seemed eerily similar to a date. His own feeling about sitting cuddled up next to Randy's big, warm belly still hadn't been sorted out completely. Part of the problem was that he knew that he'd enjoyed it. It had been warm and comfortable, and he never even felt a flash of embarrassment over his overstuffed belly throughout the whole evening. Still, the rational part of his brain told him that life would be easier for both of them if last night was just forgotten.

Luckily, it seemed like Randy had the same idea. They ran into each other in the breakroom like they usually did. It seemed that their guts both began grumbling for a midmorning snack at about the same time. He grinned and gave Scott a friendly pat on the back, but nothing else. Scott decided to take that as a good sign. His boss was still acting like his usual friendly self, so either he was willing to overlook last night or he simply didn't remember it. Either way, Scott was relieved.

"Take a few of those cupcakes. They're so good I'll have to take the whole plate if it's still there when I come back." Randy had already done some damage to the plate, judging from the empty space taking up about a quarter of it. He gave his thick middle an affectionate rub and grinned conspiratorially.

Taking his advice, Scott picked up four of the best looking samples. Normally he'd take one or two at a time, but for some reason he didn't feel like there was any need to pretend to have restraint in front of Randy, at least when it came to food.

"By the way," Randy began when Scott went to refill his mug with coffee, "I was wonderin' if you'd want to head back to that restaraunt this Thursday. A big guy with a man's appetite could really get his money's worth. They're havin'..."
1422111111221122122.title: Just Like Always

14221111112211221222.content:
"They're havin' a contest that's just perfect for us big guys. Anyone who can put away their challenge platter in one sitting gets to eat free there for a month. Anything you could possibly want off their menu, any time, as many times as you want." Randy paused for a moment, imagining the damage he'd do with such a privilege available to him. Snapping out of it, he continued, "I thought of you as soon as I heard about it. Us guys gotta stick together. You interested?"

It was a perfect offer in almost every sense. First, it showed that Randy was not angry or uncomfortable with their cuddle session. He would never invite Scott out to dinner with just him if he was. Besides that, it would mean at the very least another night of delicious, plentiful food. If he didn't succeed at the challenge he would still be able to stuff himself silly on the bar's deliciously greasy cuisine, and if he won he would be able to do the same thing as many times as he could fit into a month. Finally, though he probably wouldn't say it out loud if he could help it, he had to admit that spending an evening of gluttonous indulgence with his boss had, after only one night, become one of Scott's favorite activities. In the back of his mind, Scott knew that it would take quite a lot for him to turn down an invitation to Burger King for lunch if it came from Randy.

"You had to ask? Of course I'll be there." Scott grinned and gave his growing pot a couple of light slaps. Suddenly struck with an idea, Scott continued, "I don't know about you, but I'm thinkin' we should do what we can to make sure we win this. We've both got pretty good appetites, but it can't hurt to stretch them a bit more, can it?"

Randy gave a brief shout of laughter before clapping Scott on the shoulder and pulling him into his soft side. "I knew you were a man after my own heart Scott! You're some kind of genius. So, where should we start our trainin' regimen?"

Still, it wouldn't do for his shirt to fail while discussing a promotion with his boss. He would have to replace his shirts before dinner.

As he made his way back to the car, all Scott could think about was how hungry he suddenly was. Luckily, it was just about time for him to meet Randy.
1422111111222.title: Continue the Afternoon

The restaurant they had decided on turned out to be fairly close to the clothing store, and Scott arrived there at about the same time as his boss. He hadn't pegged Randy as the type to prefer upscale restaurants, but he wasn't really expecting a place quite like this one either. Suddenly he was glad he hadn't dressed up today.

"You were probably expecting something a bit classier, huh," asked Randy as he approached. "What can I say? I still keep mostly to the diet of a college student. It don't help me fit into my pants now that I'm not a starving student anymore, but it's certainly worth it." He gave his round paunch an affectionate little squeeze and even gave Scott's smaller belly a little pat as he held open the door.

"I think the buffet is a safe bet today. I had a pretty light lunch today and now I'm starving!" Scott grinned, remembering the extra wedge of pastry his boss had taken earlier that afternoon. He was willing to bet it hadn't been his only afternoon snack. Still, his new, larger clothes seemed to have awoken Scott's appetite, so he agreed immediately.

Leading past the salad bar with little more than a dismissive glance, Randy said, "Just remind me to grab a few veggie slices before we leave, will ya?" Scott chuckled as he loaded his plate with large slices of the delightfully greasy, cheesy sausage pizza in front of him. He made sure to suggest a seat very close to the buffet tables, foreseeing several more trips.

Scott refilled his plate twice before the tightness of his belt became a little too noticeable. Instead of letting it out a notch, he decided to simply remove it altogether. He glanced across the table as he leaned back to catch his breath and gave his gut a quick rub. It looked like his boss was ahead of him by a full plate. Randy reclined far into his seat, taking several deep breaths. His hand was going around his waistband, underneath the thick ledge of flab which sat in his lap, trying to relieve the pressure. It didn't seem to be working, because a moment later Randy simply unbuttoned his pants.

Finished, he gave Scott a triumphant grin before standing up again. "Now I'll be sure to get my money's worth! Come on, you can't be full yet."

Returning the grin, Scott took hold of the offered hand and hoisted himself up from his seat. They'd already cleared out a good amount of the pizza on the buffet tables, but they both managed to fill their plates to overflowing before returning to the table. After shoving nearly half a slice into his mouth and licking his fingers clean, Randy leaned sideways with a grunt and placed a packet onto the table.

14221111112222.title: Pizza Place

"You know," Randy said between shallow breaths, "we also paid for the dessert buffet." He sat back, grinning and running his hands over his broad, thick gut. "I like to get my money's worth and you know how to put food away almost as good as I do."

Randy's capacity was surprising and actually a bit inspiring to him. Just then he became aware of just how much he'd enjoyed sharing a meal with another man who knew how to enjoy himself.

Randy read his grin accurately and hoisted himself out of his seat with a groan. His gut always rounded out in front of him, but now the soft flesh was riding higher and firmer than usual. Without thinking, Scott gave his boss's stomach a gentle pat saying, "Are you sure there's any room left in there?"

Mike sighed as he finished drying off from his morning shower, cinching the towel around his waist. His breakfast (scrambled eggs, toast, bacon, sausage, gravy, and homemade donuts) sat heavy in his stomach, and with a quick, contented pat to his belly Mike stepped up onto the scale. The digital display flashed up a weight of 195 pounds, a fifteen pound gain since Mike had retired.

'Well, part of that's from breakfast,' he thought as he stepped down, examining his reflection in the mirror hanging on the door. 'But not all of it.'

There was no denying that he had put on weight; it was only a few pounds or so, but it was visible in the blurring of his abs (he was one of the only sixty+ age guys he knew who still had those), in the faint softening of his powerful chest muscles, and in the slight rounding of his face.

He stood there, continuing to contemplate his reflection as he idly scratched at his silver chest hair.

'Well, Mike, there's a couple of ways this can go from here. One: you find something as active as the factory.' The idea was distasteful to him; Mike had begun work at a very early age in life, and worked hard for over four decades. Careful money management had given him more than enough money to support himself and his wife for the rest of their lives, and it was time for him to relax and enjoy life more.

'Option two: you cut back on Georgia's cooking.' Even more distasteful, as Georgia was an absolutely fabulous cook, and Mike could never bring himself to leave the table without at least seconds, and often with thirds.

'Or, option three: you accept that you're gaining weight, and just don't worry about. Maybe you won't look so trim and fit anymore, but Georgia's always moaned about how nothin'll stick to your ribs anyway; she likes a man with some meat on his bones.
